question: What will be the closing value of the S&P 500 on Jan 30, 2026?
description: Predict the official closing price of the S&P 500 Index (SPX) on the final trading day of January.
resolutionCriteria:
Resolves to the official closing value reported by S&P Dow Jones.
- Date: Jan 30, 2026.
- Hard Lock: 3:45 PM ET (15 mins before close).
- Note: Settlement often takes 10-20 mins after bell.
